title: Verify successful shipment creation with valid data
description: Test that a user can create a new shipment with all required and valid fields, and that the shipment is saved correctly in the system with a generated AWB number.

steps.description: Navigate to shipment creation page
Input all required shipment details with valid values
Submit the shipment creation form
Verify the shipment is created successfully, AWB number is generated, and visible in the shipment list

title: Validate shipment creation with missing mandatory fields
description: Ensure form validation prevents shipment creation when mandatory fields are missing and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Open shipment creation page
Leave one or more mandatory fields empty
Attempt to submit the form
Verify the form submission is blocked and relevant validation error messages are displayed for each missing field

title: Verify offline scanning queue persists and syncs correctly
description: Test warehouse scanning workflow where scan data is stored locally when offline and synced automatically when network is restored, with visible status feedback.

steps.description: Switch device/network to offline mode
Perform multiple barcode/QR code scans for shipments and manifests
Verify scan data is saved locally in queue and user sees status indicating offline storage
Restore network connectivity
Verify queued scans are automatically synced with backend without data loss and user status updates accordingly

title: Validate role-based UI access restrictions
description: Verify that users see UI components and navigation options only for features corresponding to their assigned roles.

steps.description: Log in as each user role (ADMIN, MANAGER, OPS, WAREHOUSE_IMPHAL, WAREHOUSE_DELHI, INVOICE, SUPPORT)
Check that UI only shows modules, buttons, and routes accessible to the logged-in user role
Attempt to navigate directly to unauthorized routes via URL
Verify access is denied and user is redirected appropriately

title: Verify Supabase Row Level Security enforcement on protected data
description: Test that backend data access is restricted per user roles and organization scope, preventing unauthorized data queries or modifications.

steps.description: Perform API calls or data queries as users with different roles and org scopes
Confirm users only receive data authorized for their role and organization; unauthorized data is inaccessible
Attempt data modification operations (create/update/delete) outside user permissions
Verify such operations are blocked by RLS policies and appropriate error messages returned

title: Test manifest lifecycle and shipment status updates on manifest close
description: Verify manifest creation, shipment assignments, and that closing a manifest updates shipment statuses and tracking events atomically.

steps.description: Create a new manifest and assign multiple shipments via scanning and manual input
Verify manifest and shipment assignment records are created correctly
Close the manifest through the UI
Verify manifest status is updated to closed, all assigned shipments update statuses accordingly, and tracking events are generated

title: Validate audit logging for critical create, update, delete actions
description: Check that all critical operations performed by users generate corresponding audit log entries capturing user info, timestamps, and action details.

steps.description: Perform create, update, and delete actions on shipments, manifests, invoices, and exceptions
Verify audit logs are created with accurate details for each action in the audit log store

title: Test invoice generation with PDF and email sending via Resend API
description: Validate that finance staff can create invoices, generate correct PDFs including labels with barcodes and QR codes, print them, and send invoice emails successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to invoice creation page and create a new invoice linked to shipments
Generate PDF for the invoice and labels
Verify PDF files are accurate with correct barcodes and QR codes, and are printable
Send invoice email using integrated Resend API
Confirm email is sent successfully, and email content is correct

title: Verify real-time shipment tracking and timeline display
description: Ensure that shipment tracking timeline displays real-time event updates, with tracking by AWB and proper handling of exceptions.

steps.description: Search for a shipment by valid AWB number
Verify displayed tracking timeline is accurate, shows all status events, and updates in real time when new tracking data is added
Inject or simulate exception events for the shipment
Verify exceptions are clearly indicated in the tracking timeline

title: Test UI responsiveness, dark/light mode toggling, and keyboard navigation
description: Verify the UI adapts correctly to screen sizes, theme toggling functions properly, and the application is fully navigable via keyboard controls.

steps.description: Resize browser window through various common dimensions (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Confirm UI layout and responsiveness adjust properly without content overflow or misalignment
Toggle between dark mode and light mode
Verify UI colors, themes, and components update instantly and correctly for each mode
Navigate through major UI flows using only keyboard (tab, shift+tab, enter, arrow keys)
Ensure focus states are visible and navigation is logical and accessible

title: Validate error boundary and Sentry error reporting integration
description: Test that uncaught UI errors trigger error boundaries showing friendly messages and that errors are reported to Sentry with full user context and breadcrumbs.

steps.description: Simulate a UI component error or throw an exception in a controlled environment
Verify error boundary displays an appropriate fallback UI instead of breaking the entire app
Check that the error is sent to Sentry with user context, breadcrumbs, and session replay captured

title: Ensure audit logs are accessible only by authorized roles
description: Verify only ADMIN and MANAGER roles can view audit logs, and other roles are denied access at UI and route levels.

steps.description: Log in as ADMIN and MANAGER users, navigate to audit logs page
Confirm audit logs are visible and correctly listed
Log in as other roles (OPS, WAREHOUSE, INVOICE, SUPPORT), attempt to access audit logs
Confirm access is denied with appropriate route guard or UI message

title: Test real-time dashboard analytics update on data changes
description: Verify KPIs and tracking event timelines on the dashboard update in real time as shipment data and manifests are created or updated.

steps.description: Open dashboard page and note KPI values and event timeline
Create or update shipments and manifests that affect KPIs
Verify dashboard metrics and timeline reflect changes with minimal delay without page refresh

title: Validate user management functions including role assignment
description: Ensure ADMIN users can create, edit, disable, and assign roles to staff members, and that role changes affect UI access immediately.

steps.description: Log in as ADMIN and navigate to user management
Create a new user with a specific role
Verify user is created and appears in staff list with correct role
Modify an existing userâ€™s role
Verify role update is saved and that login with modified user reflects updated access
Disable a user account
Verify disabled users cannot log in or access system features

title: Verify exception handling and resolution workflow
description: Test creating, tracking, and resolving delivery exceptions with proper status updates and notifications.

steps.description: Create a new exception related to a shipment
Verify exception is displayed in exceptions list with correct details
Update exception status to resolved
Confirm status change is saved and visible, and any linked shipment tracking reflects resolution

title: Validate manifest and label PDF printing functionality
description: Ensure manifests and labels generate PDF documents accurately with correct formatting, barcodes, and QR codes, and open print dialog successfully.

steps.description: Generate manifest and label PDFs from manifest or shipment detail pages
Verify generated PDFs render correctly with all required shipment and manifest information, including scannable codes
Initiate PDF printing
Confirm print dialog opens and documents preview properly for user printing

title: Test user preferences and theme persistence across sessions
description: Validate that theme selections (dark/light mode) and other user settings persist correctly after logout and login across multiple sessions.

steps.description: Log in, change theme to dark or light mode and modify user preferences
Log out and log back in
Verify theme and preferences are restored as per last saved state
